title: Revolutionary Road - man is "touched with terror"

content.prompt: The man is “touched with terror” (paragraph 4) because of his

choices.label: fear of committing an unforgivable social gaffe
failure to recall the timing of a notable occurrence

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify and describe what specific textual details reveal about a character, that character's perspective, and that character's motives.
